mapper.insert: insert into t_push_member ( token_id, device_type, phone_num, loc_id, lang_id, longtitude, latitude, create_date ) values ( #{token_id}, #{device_type}, #{phone_num}, #{loc_id}, #{lang_id}, #{longtitude}, #{latitude}, now() ) on duplicate key update loc_id = #{loc_id}, lang_id = #{lang_id}, longtitude = #{longtitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, mod_date = now()
